author: Chris Zadorozny chris.zadorozny@sentinel-standard.com
title: Upcoming Varsity Sports Weekly Schedule
text: Upcoming Varsity Sports Weekly Schedule This week begins the final full week of October with next Sunday being November 1. Soccer districts start this week while we head into the final game of the regular season for football. Volleyball will get their final regular season games in too before playoffs. Here’s the schedule of all varsity sports from Monday, Oct. 19 to Saturday, Oct. 24. The schedule is laid out by time. Comment Posted Oct. 18, 2015 at 12:56 PM By Chris Zadorozny Posted Oct. 18, 2015 at 12:56 PM IONIA - This week begins the final full week of October with next Sunday being November 1. Soccer districts start this week while we head into the final game of the regular season for football. Volleyball will get their final regular season games in too before playoffs. Here’s the schedule of all varsity sports from Monday, Oct. 19 to Saturday, Oct. 24. The schedule is laid out by time. Monday, Oct. 19 Cross Country - Belding at Allendale - 4:30pm Soccer - Belding vs. Portland at Portland (Division 3, District 36) - 4:30 p.m. Volleyball - Saranac at Grand River Prep - 5 p.m. Volleyball - Belding at West Catholic - 6 p.m. Volleyball - Lakewood vs. Stockbridge - 6 p.m. Swimming - Ionia at Alma - 6 p.m. Volleyball - Portland St. Patrick at Laingsburg - 7 p.m. Wednesday, Oct. 21 Cross Country - CMAC Jamboree at Portland St. Patrick (Pewamo-Westphalia/Saranac) - 5 p.m. Volleyball - Ionia vs. Lansing Catholic - 6:30 p.m. Volleyball - Portland vs. Eaton Rapids - 6:30 p.m. Volleyball - Pewamo-Westphalia vs. Potterville - 7 p.m. Volleyball - Saranac vs. Fulton - 7 p.m. Thursday, Oct. 22 Cross Country - CAAC White Jamboree at Eaton Rapids (Ionia/Portland) - 5 p.m. Soccer - Ionia vs. Haslett or Lansing Eastern at East Lansing Rosen Field (Division 2, District 29) - 5 p.m. Soccer - Belding or Portland vs. Kelloggsville or Grand River Prep at TBD (Division 3, District 36) - TBD Swimming - Ionia vs. Lansing Everett - 6 p.m. Friday, Oct. 23 Football - Ionia at Lakewood - 7 p.m. (PINK OUT) Football - Portland vs. Marshall - 7 p.m. (Senior Night) Football - Saranac at Wyoming Tri-Unity Christian - 7 p.m. Football - Belding vs. Allendale - 7 p.m. (Homecoming, Senior Night) Football - Pewamo-Westphalia at Grandville Calvin Christian - 7 p.m. Saturday, Oct. 24 Cross Country - Portland St. Patrick at Class D Meet (Mt. Pleasant Sacred Heart) - 8 a.m. Volleyball - Portland at St. Louis Invite - 8 a.m. Cross Country - Lakewood at Leslie Invite - 9 a.m. Volleyball - Lakewood at Leslie Invite - 9 a.m. Volleyball - Saranac JV Invite - 9 a.m. Cross Country - Ionia at Chippewa Hills Invite - 11 a.m. Football - Portland St. Patrick vs. Morrice - 7 p.m. (Senior Night) If there is an event missing from this calendar, please email Sports Editor Chris Zadorozny at chris.zadorozny @sentinel-standard.com. By Chris Zadorozny
